result.execSummary:
All charges against Adam Lee Schlusser in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam Lee Schlusser is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Lee Schlusser

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Adam Lee Schlusser in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Katrina Amy Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Adam Lee Schlusser appeared by video means.
Case in court for pre-trial conference. On motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 06-29-2022, received and filed
State's Motion to Dismiss (Without Prejudice), filed.

Court ordered no contact with D.A.P.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Victim's Witness Advocate K Legler and alleged victim DAP present via Zoom

Defendant Adam Lee Schlusser in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant Adam Lee Schlusser in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Adam Lee Schlusser appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
